TheWord.Title: I AM A God that understands. Trained in the act of God.

Remember.Commentary: 20030722 Newark Library 6300 Civic Terrace Avenue Newark CA 94560-3795 Tel: (510) 795-2627 http://www.aclibrary.org. Christ in agony, prayed more earnestly: and His sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground (Luke 22:44). 20020723 On the Road to Damascus. On two occassion, I will drink juice from the drink machine. African descent woman will serve rice and noodle. I request more serving. Sacrifice type, intersection of Seventh street and H Street, Gbogbowa (Romans 12). Visit Chapel of the Chimes on Mission Blvd, Hayward. Visit Afghan Mosque on Mission Blvd, Hayward "I AM, all I Own", intersection of Mission Blvd and Blanche St, Hayward. Eat Domino Pizza on Fremont Blvd. Visit Fremont City Library. ScriptureReading.ScriptureReference: Amos 9, Obadiah 1, Jonah 1-4, Micah 1-5, Micah 6-7, Matthew 1-18

BibleWord.Commentary: Solomon my son, know you the God of your father, and serve Him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the LORD searches all hearts, and understands all the imaginations of the thoughts: if you seek Him, He will be found of you; but if you forsake Him, He will cast you off for ever (1 Chronicles 28:9). God understands the way thereof, and He knows the place thereof (Job 28:23). Have you not known? have you not heard, that the everlasting God, the LORD, the Creator of the ends of the earth, faints not, neither is weary? there is no searching of His understanding (Isaiah 40:28).

AlphabetSequence.Word: I AM A God that understands.
Trained in the act of God.

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Shower: back turned towards Highway 84 Thornton Avenue, towel, fault.
I AM A God that understands: Fly, flys on the eye, right. Trained in the act of God: Highway 880 Thornton Avenue, 6 birds will fly across the street from 880 North towards the 880 South.

The Light of Buddha Temple. 632 Oak Street. The intersection of Oak Street 700 and 7th Street 100. Therefore will He give them up, until the time that she which travails has brought forth: then the remnant of his brethren shall return unto the children (Micah 5:3). Ceremony for the grand parents. ... crawling towards Oak Street (Micah 7:17). Second visit: Generousity. Re-locate from the back towards the front, prefers the 3rd row but the cleaner will currently occupy the 3rd row; therefore, temporarily occupy the front row, after re-locating to the 3rd row, tears from the right eye, subsequently tears falls from both eyes as attendant places plates from or into the shelf on the left wall.

Christian Layman Church Grand Avenue Seventh Day Adventist Church 278 Grand Avenue, Oakland 94610 info@christianlayman.org http://www.christianlayman.org Tel: (510) 526.5855 Fax: (510) 526.5880. Urinate: falls on the trouser, right, side, the longest is L shaped, and the shorter is higher.
Lake Shore Avenue, Lake Merritt: Walk past the tennis court, birds fly towards the right, continously.

Ark of Grace -ARCA DE GRACIA- 5970 Thornton Avenue Newark CA 94560-3829 Services: Fridays at 7:30PM Sunday at 2:00PM. Tears, eye, right (Matthew 3:9, Matthew 4:17, Matthew 6:15, Matthew 8:1, Matthew 9:17, Matthew 15:22, Matthew 16:7). Pencil, orange, rolls, backwards (Matthew 6:15). Fingers, right, touches the right ear (Matthew 9:17). Eyes close (Matthew 13:13). Mouth utterance (Matthew 16:7). This is the day the LORD has made, I will rejoice and be glad in it (Psalms 118:24). Altar call: tears, eye, right and subsequently left; nose, right, running.
